CHAT.comment: BRENTWOOD ACADEMY, Petitioner v. TENNESSEE SECONDARY SCHOOL ATHLETIC ASSOCIATION, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:06 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES F. BLUMSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA D. UNDERWOOD ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF RICHARD L. COLBERT ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT [*47] OF JAMES F. BLUMSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
(Whereupon, at 12:04 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
